name: 4th Jump
description:
4th Jump is a project assignment for the Digital Games course at FIAP college in São Paulo, Brazil.

Use LEFT and RIGHT arrows to move, Z to jump/attack and R to restart the level. Reach the top of the level to get to the next one.

The game was made in Unity and all assets in this project are free to use and can be found in the links bellow.

16x16 Industrial Tileset by Robert: https://0x72.itch.io/16x16-industrial-tileset

8x8 Font by ImpossibleRealms: https://opengameart.org/content/8x8-font-chomps-wacky-worlds-beta

Opening music theme Epic by Wolfgang: https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-theme-intensity

Game music by CodeManu: https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-music-pack-loopable

Slash sound effect by Little Robot Sound Factory: https://opengameart.org/content/8-bit-sound-effects-library

All other sound effects (jump, landing, deaths, lever) by Juhani Junkala https://opengameart.org/content/512-sound-effects-8-bit-style

Thank you for playing!
If you like it, please leave a comment!
And if you don't like it, please let me know why in the comments also!

- André Kanamura
